timeline.message:
fix(e2e): Fix small logging issues

log4j.properties doesn't recurse with star notation, it just recurses in this notation

The start/stop logs should be to our logger, not system.out. That way we get the logger timestamp for free on these two logs

timeline.bodyText: For some reason, this log never had a newline character printed even though you don't normally have to manually add one. I went ahead and added so it definitely would
timeline.author: timtay-microsoft

replies.bodyText: interesting that we don't add this elsewhere but it still adds a newline at the end of each log
replies.author: abhipsaMisra

timeline.bodyText: Removing the star here allows for the expected recursion to pick up logs from this package and subpackages
timeline.author: timtay-microsoft
